alert.note: Alert for Roger Mills (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 4:10PM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Roger Mills County through 445 PM CDT... At 410 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles southwest of Crawford, moving southwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Reydon and Crawford. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
